findings.title: Burn within PancakePair.sol should have safety checks native to the function
findings.description: The burn function within PancakePair.sol lacks safety checks and relies on external contracts, making it vulnerable to external interference.

findings.title: TODO item remains in code
findings.description: A TODO item was left in the DataTypes.sol contract

findings.title: Resource Exhaustion in registerLendables
findings.description: registerLendables within ReserveFactory.sol can result in resource exhaustion when too many lendables are registered at one time.

findings.title: No Zero/Null Checks on Setters
findings.description: The ParamProvider contract does not perform zero/null checks on setter functions, which can lead to potential security vulnerabilities.

findings.title: Error message in PancakePair could be more verbose
findings.description: The error message in the require statement within PancakePair.sol can be improved to provide more detailed information.

findings.title: Solidity style guide is not followed for variable or function naming
findings.description: The contract does not follow the Solidity style guide for variable or function naming.

findings.title: Extensive typographical errors throughout the contract
findings.description: Presence of numerous typographical errors primarily within code comments.

findings.title: Reentrancy
findings.description: Numerous reentrant functions throughout the protocol could benefit from the usage of ReentrancyGuard.

findings.title: Unchecked external call
findings.description: The function does not check the return value of an external call which can lead to unexpected behavior.

findings.title: Unchecked math
findings.description: Calculation has multiple issues as denoted within the audit findings.

findings.title: Implicit visibility level
findings.description: Some functions have implicit visibility levels instead of being explicitly declared as public.
